scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs her original song 'MAKE IT, BREAK IT' during the Future Gazer 3D Live concert.
Hiodoshi Ao performs 'Ao no Tsuitachi' (Blue New Moon) during the Future Gazer 3D Live concert.

subtitles.original: マスカラ塗り直して振る振るるん
subtitles.english: Reapplying mascara, shake shake shake

subtitles.original: あー 可愛くなりすぎちゃったかも
subtitles.english: Ah, maybe I've become too cute

subtitles.original: さすがに盛りすぎちゃったかも
subtitles.english: I might've overdone it with the makeup

subtitles.original: あなたのナンバーワンです だって
subtitles.english: I'm your number one, because...

subtitles.original: 超大好きなんだから
subtitles.english: ...I love you so super much

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 もうちょっとだけ
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, just a little bit more

subtitles.original: 可愛くなってもいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay if I become even cuter?

subtitles.original: いつだって正直にいて
subtitles.english: Always stay honest

subtitles.original: それで
subtitles.english: And then...

subtitles.original: 秘密 秘密 秘密の可愛い子ちゃんにはなれない
subtitles.english: I can't be a 'secret, secret, secret cute girl'

subtitles.original: そんなこと全部お見通しです
subtitles.english: I can see through everything like that

subtitles.original: だって 逆に
subtitles.english: Because, conversely

subtitles.original: 秘密 秘密 秘密は私たちにはいらない
subtitles.english: Secrets, secrets, we don't need secrets

subtitles.original: だけどあなたが秘密にしたいほど
subtitles.english: But so much that you'd want to keep it a secret

subtitles.original: 可愛くなりすぎちゃったかも
subtitles.english: Maybe I've become too cute

subtitles.original: 朝起きてそうだ休み
subtitles.english: Waking up in the morning, oh right, it's a holiday

subtitles.original: やりたいことありすぎ
subtitles.english: Too many things I want to do

subtitles.original: 一日は24時間って言うけど
subtitles.english: They say a day has 24 hours, but...

subtitles.original: ずっと起きてるわけでもない
subtitles.english: ...it's not like I'm awake the whole time

subtitles.original: 帰ったらまた鏡
subtitles.english: When I get home, it's the mirror again

subtitles.original: 当たり前とかじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not like it's a given

subtitles.original: とにかく自分を大事にしましょう
subtitles.english: Anyway, let's take care of ourselves

subtitles.original: ずっと付き合ってくんだから
subtitles.english: Because we're going to be together forever

subtitles.original: ママから聞いたことあるわ
subtitles.english: I've heard it from my mom

subtitles.original: 10時から2時は寝るのがよくて
subtitles.english: It's best to sleep from 10 PM to 2 AM

subtitles.original: 6時以降は食べないほうがいい
subtitles.english: And better not to eat after 6 PM

subtitles.original: いや無理です
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's impossible

subtitles.original: みんな思ったことあるわ
subtitles.english: Everyone's thought about it

subtitles.original: 寝てる間に変わらないのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I won't change while I sleep

subtitles.original: いやいややっぱ真剣に変身したい
subtitles.english: No, no, I really want to transform for real

subtitles.original: マスカラ塗り直して振る振るるん
subtitles.english: Reapplying mascara, shake shake shake

subtitles.original: あー 可愛くなりすぎていい？
subtitles.english: Ah, is it okay to become too cute?

subtitles.original: 本当に盛りすぎていい？
subtitles.english: Is it really okay to overdo it?

subtitles.original: あなたのこと好きです だって
subtitles.english: I like you, because...

subtitles.original: 超前向きなんだから
subtitles.english: ...I'm super positive

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 もうちょっとだけ
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, just a little bit more

subtitles.original: 可愛くなってもいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay if I become even cuter?

subtitles.original: いつだって正直にいて
subtitles.english: Always stay honest

subtitles.original: もう 大好きで 大好きで
subtitles.english: I already love you so much, so much

subtitles.original: 君に前向きに言っていいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay to tell your positive self?

subtitles.original: 自分で今魔法かけます
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on myself now

subtitles.original: 嘘でもかかったふりしてね
subtitles.english: Pretend it worked, even if it's a lie

subtitles.original: でも私もあなたも嘘がつけない
subtitles.english: But neither you nor I can lie

subtitles.original: そういう奴だからさ
subtitles.english: Because we're just that kind of person

subtitles.original: マスカラ塗り直して振る振るるん
subtitles.english: Reapplying mascara, shake shake shake

subtitles.original: あー 可愛くなりすぎていい？
subtitles.english: Ah, is it okay to become too cute?

subtitles.original: 本当に盛りすぎていい？
subtitles.english: Is it really okay to overdo it?

subtitles.original: あなたのこと好きです だって
subtitles.english: I like you, because...

subtitles.original: 超前向きなんだから
subtitles.english: ...I'm super positive

subtitles.english: Is it okay if I become even cuter?

subtitles.original: いつだって正直にいて
subtitles.english: Always stay honest

subtitles.english: Ah, maybe I've become too cute

subtitles.original: さすがに盛りすぎちゃったかも
subtitles.english: I might've overdone it with the makeup

subtitles.original: あなたのナンバーワンです だって
subtitles.english: I'm your number one, because...

subtitles.original: 超大好きなんだから
subtitles.english: ...I love you so super much

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 もうちょっとだけ
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, just a little bit more

subtitles.original: 可愛くなってもいいのかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay if I become even cuter?

subtitles.original: いつだって正直にいて
subtitles.english: Always stay honest

subtitles.original: それで
subtitles.english: And then...

subtitles.original: 秘密 秘密 秘密の可愛い子ちゃんにはなれない
subtitles.english: I can't be a 'secret, secret, secret cute girl'

subtitles.original: そんなこと全部お見通しです
subtitles.english: I can see through everything like that

subtitles.original: だって 逆に
subtitles.english: Because, conversely

subtitles.original: 秘密 秘密 秘密は私たちにはいらない
subtitles.english: Secrets, secrets, we don't need secrets

subtitles.original: だけどあなたが秘密にしたいほど
subtitles.english: But so much that you'd want to keep it a secret

subtitles.original: 可愛くなりすぎちゃったです
subtitles.english: I've become just too cute

subtitles.original: 青の朔日 / 作詞・作曲: 藤原基央
subtitles.english: Blue New Moon / Lyrics & Composition: Motoo Fujiwara

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜の途中
subtitles.english: In the middle of an endless night

subtitles.original: 明かりを忘れた空には
subtitles.english: In the sky that has forgotten its light

subtitles.original: 戻れない日の指切りを
subtitles.english: A pinky swear for days we can't return to

subtitles.original: カシオペアの代わりに
subtitles.english: Instead of Cassiopeia

subtitles.original: 独り待った だから
subtitles.english: I waited alone, so...

subtitles.original: 物が落とす影を追っていたら
subtitles.english: ...while chasing the shadows things cast

subtitles.original: 真っ暗に紛れて混ざって
subtitles.english: Fading and mixing into the pitch black

subtitles.original: 見つけられないままで
subtitles.english: I remain unable to be found

subtitles.original: いくつものドアを開けて
subtitles.english: Opening numerous doors

subtitles.original: 繰り返す景色を泳ぐ
subtitles.english: I swim through repeating scenery

subtitles.original: 心がまだ疲れながら
subtitles.english: Even while my heart is still weary

subtitles.original: そのためだけに動いてる
subtitles.english: I'm moving just for that purpose

subtitles.original: これはきっと帰り道
subtitles.english: This is surely the way home

subtitles.original: 夢の向こうに続く道
subtitles.english: A path continuing beyond dreams

subtitles.original: 誇れる歌を纏えば
subtitles.english: If I clothe myself in a song I can be proud of

subtitles.original: 何も怖くはない
subtitles.english: I'll have nothing to fear

subtitles.original: 命は理由に出会えた
subtitles.english: Life has found its reason

subtitles.original: 燃えて消える意味を知った
subtitles.english: I learned the meaning of burning and disappearing

subtitles.original: その陽が視界を照らした
subtitles.english: That sun illuminated my vision

subtitles.original: 青く 青く どこまでも
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, as far as the eye can see

subtitles.original: 明日が全てを失っても
subtitles.english: Even if tomorrow loses everything
